price: Ishee keessa nituru. Ishee irraa jijjiiramuu hin barbaadan.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا لَا يَبۡغُونَ عَنۡهَا حِوَلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā lā yabghūna ʿanhā ḥiwalan
